## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                      | Type                              | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `icon`     | `icon`     |                                                                                  | `string`                          | `undefined` |
| `size`     | `size`     |                                                                                  | `"large" \| "small"`              | `'large'`   |
| `text`     | `text`     |                                                                                  | `string`                          | `undefined` |
| `timeout`  | `timeout`  | Hide the toast after defined milliseconds.                                       | `number`                          | `3000`      |
| `undoable` | `undoable` |                                                                                  | `"icon" \| "none" \| "text"`      | `'none'`    |
| `variant`  | `variant`  | Possible variants of the component: can be with single text row or multiple ones | `"multiple-rows" \| "single-row"` | `undefined` |
